getQuality

public long getQuality()
Get the quality. The range is from 0 to 100, 100 is the best quality When the image is stored into PDF not as a mask, you may reduce its quality, which saves the disk space.

setQuality

public void setQuality(long value)
Set the quality. The range is from 0 to 100, 100 is the best quality When the image is stored into PDF not as a mask, you may reduce its quality, which saves the disk space.
